adjectives.description: slamming (comparative more slamming, superlative most slamming)

examples: First off, how could I ever be a totally slamming, hot French expert on free-running. But, that technicality aside, I honestly don't want to be Henri.

entries.meaning: The act of something being slammed.
examples: He would also have been exposed to the coughings and shufflings, comings and goings, questions and answers, wailings and slammings, snivellings and sneezings, etc., which figured so prominently in the reference room  [â€¦]
